name: Pocket Billiards: Funk the 9 Ball
description: A billiards game where you collect spirits called Tamapi to store inside balls to affect gameplay when sunk into a pocket, such as shaking the table or getting another turn if you fail to pocket a ball on a turn. Collect more spirits from opponents by defeating them. During the rounds of billiards you can win items such as MiniDiscs to unlock new music for the DJ to play in the background.
